name: Aurora Garden
description:
Find your way through the everchanging garden maze. Attune to the color crystals and watch the whole level change.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2014.

Programming by Piotr Gieroba
@pgieroba

Graphics by Nekhara
nekhara.daportfolio.com

Level design, music and sound effects by Norbert "Odd" Pokorski
@OddThought_
